dmca.title: [ABUSE] URGENT: DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, January 10, 2005 4:47 PM
To: Rosenfield, Kevin (SEA)
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] URGENT: DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/



RKS> I am an attorney for Valve Corporation.  Thank you for your
RKS> prompt attention to this matter.  I look forward to your
RKS> confirmation that the infringing material has been removed from
RKS> your systems.

RKS>  <<KA1RL20CS==Planet DMCA.doc>>

RKS> January 10, 2005



RKS> URGENT/IMMEDIATE ATTENTION REQUIRED
RKS> VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL

RKS> The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
RKS> 1333 Stemmons Freeway - Suite 110
RKS> Dallas, TX  75207
RKS> +1-214-782-7800  (Office)
RKS> abuse@theplanet.com

RKS> Re:  NOTICE OF ALLEGED COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

RKS> Dear The Planet Internet Services, Inc.:
RKS>                
RKS> This letter serves as notification under the Digital
RKS> Millennium Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C.
dmca.principal_name: Preston Gates & Ellis LLP (for Valve Corporation)
